titleStmt.title: The life and death of Mr. Ignatius Jurdain, one of the aldermen of the city of Exeter; who departed this life July 15th. 1640. Drawn up and published by Ferd. Nicolls, minister of the Gospel at Mary Arches, Exon.
titleStmt.author: Nicolls, Ferdinando, 1598?-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Newberry, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Golden Lions on Corn-hill by the Royal Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the three Golden Lions on Corn-hill
